name: Ricochet (itch) (Naethure)
description:
Ricochet is a game about shooting a laser at a target. Place reflectors using left click to guide your laser to your target. Right click when you have one point placed to cancel placing, or right click on a placed reflector to pick it back up. You only have a limited number of reflectors, and a limited number of laser shots. Space fires your laser.

Your starting angle is out of your control, and you might find that laser bounces are pretty hard to control as well, but there's no randomness in their bounces.

Controls:
Left Click - Place an end of a reflector
Right Click - Cancel a reflector being placed, or pick a reflector up that's already been placed
Space - Fire your laser
R - Destroy any laser you have in flight
N - (Game Jam Version Only) Skip to the next level
